data.title: Establish for academic cum consultancy Institution
data.text:
Novel Academy also provides wonderful placement and internship opportunity. Every year academy organize job fair program in its premises in collaboration with its placement partners and corporate world. The main aim of this fair is to allow students to meet with employers to discover Internship Opportunities, job opportunities or any senior level full time positions.

Academy Established Novel Foundation which is non-profit organizations NGO towards alleviating poverty or solving other pervasive social problems to make our Country Nepal a poverty free nation by creating Social Entrepreneurs in our society. Through our Foundation, it works with strategic partners to develop and implement programs that create economic opportunity for marginalized people for sustainable development, empower Young for Social Entrepreneurship, improve public health, and inspire young aspirant’s engagement and service. The Foundation is committed to cultivating a diverse, new generation of leaders. Our main theme is to build a future where our children will be proud of us that we cared for people, planet and profit at the same time.

Novel Academy in association with Novel Foundation has established Novel Yunus Social Business Centre (YSBC) in Pokhara. Novel Yunus Social Business Centre is the centre of innovation and entrepreneurial development at Novel Academy. It facilitates the growth of Social Entrepreneurship and Commercial Entrepreneurship through academic teaching, training, providing access to seed capital, mentoring and networking. The Centre runs its Incubation Centre to transform the ideas into concrete business projects and aspires to guide the start-ups or existing organizations towards more challenging and profitable goals.

Novel Academy has signed articulation agreement with foreign universities for student exchange programs, faculty development workshops and credit transfers facilities to continue for their further study in abroad .Novel graduates will get privilege to continue their further education in these universities with special scholarship schemes.

Prominent among them are:

- University of Cambridge , UK - Herzing University,USA

- North West Missouri State University , USA - California State University , USA

- IGlobal University , USA - Liverpool John Moore University , UK

- Sheffield University , UK - Brickfields Asian College, Malaysia

- Dr. Gaur Hari Singhania Institute , India - Hochschule Darmstadt University , Germany

- British Council - United States Education Foundation (USEF)

- CQU, Australia - University of Oman

- Yunus Center , Bangaladesh

Our vision is to become the first choice learning institute for education in management, health and allied science, through our visionary leadership, innovative and Creative students and parent’s satisfaction, now we have a mission to be a leading college of Nepal appreciated by all sections of Society. The academy aims to encourage students to be confident and competent in the modern world with changes in environment socially and organizational challenges that are rapidly happening daily across all borders of the world.
